name: Orbital X
description: An epic journey through the endless space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: The only requirement is Shader Model 3.0. It should run smoothly even on older hardware. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any model is fine.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core recommended) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: The only requirement is Shader Model 3.0. It should run smoothly even on older hardware. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any model is fine.
